column4: Actually I am a kubuntu user but right now I am installing a Gnome software so I thought I would ask here. 'libbonobo2-common' and 'libbonobo2-0' both depend on each other what should I do ??
let the package manager sort out the dependencies fo ryou
uh.......read the man pages and figure out the right options for apt-get to tell you what packages need to be installed
or...take your box to work or something
When all odds are against you, then to get things done you have to becomne crazy
you can't - go home - go to sleep
If you can't help at least donot discourage people  ;)
you're asking for something that isn't practical
not being discouraging...just stating the obvious truth
get a job and a network connection
I am practically using it for 6 months and will keep using it whatever may be the odds. Because the other option is Windows and it s***s
It seems that kubuntu people are more helping bye
I am joking don't take it seriously. I know you people are helpful
i've been using linux as an admin and user for about 5 years now...just siwtched to ubuntu and this is the first time i've been on these forums
i don't mind helping newbies...i was one once too
Don't worry, I will not remain a newbie for long
but, you'll probably get an earful every now and then - i have high standards
